<letter id='abl428'>
<recipient first='Henry' last='Halleck' type='individual'/>
<p>
EXECUTIVE MANSION, <a href='/results.php?city=washington' rel='city origin'>WASHINGTON</a><br>
January 7, <a href="/results.php?year=1863">1863</a>.
</p><p>
MAJOR-GENERAL HALLECK.
</p><p>
MY DEAR SIR:--What think you of forming a reserve cavalry corps of, say, 6000 for the Army of the Potomac? Might not such a corps be
constituted from the cavalry of Sigel's and Slocum's corps, with scraps we could pick up here and there?
</p><p>
Yours truly,
</p>
<a href="/results.php?tla=abl" rel="me">A. LINCOLN.</a>
</letter>
